Header: “Dog Days” scheduled to be released this month
Content: “Dog Days” is an upcoming American family comedy-drama film, directed by Ken Marino, from a screenplay by Elissa Matsueda and Erica Oyama. It stars Eva Longoria, Nina Dobrev, Vanessa Hudgens, Lauren Lapkus and Finn Wolfhard. An ensemble comedy that follows the lives of multiple dog owners and their beloved fluffy pals around sunny Los Angeles. When these human and canine’s paths start to intertwine, their lives begin changing in ways they never expected. It is scheduled to be released on 8th of this month by LD Entertainment.
